title: Drawing, 1871
medium: Brush and black wash, graphite on cream paper; verso: graphite
signed: Signed in graphite, lower right: T.M. 1871
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, upper left: Small Hot Spring on Gardener's River; upper center: steam; lower center: white; lower left: (6).; verso: inscribed in graphite, upper right: Corinne, Utah. June  ...  71; and repeatedly at center: snow; [according to Rudolph Berliner in 1943] and in ink: No. 276.
description: Recto: horizontal view of a small hot spring on Gardener's River located in a wooded valley, with mountain ranges in background. Verso: horizontal view of a distant Corinne, Utah at foot of snow capped mountains.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, 1871.
1871. Brush and black wash, graphite on cream paper; verso: graphite. Gift of Thomas Moran. 1917-17-6.
